src_text: Valavisisi vo suka eYunivhesithi ya Princeton eUnited States na Yunivhesithi ya Uppsala eSweden va vike leswaku muxaka lowuntswha wu humelele eka switukulwana swimbirhi ntsena, hambileswi a ku tshembhiwa leswaku muxaka lowu wu teka nkarhi wo leha, hikwalaho ko hlangana ka Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, na lexi humaka eka tiko rin’wana cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.
ref_text: Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.
hyp_text: The University of Princeton in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden have a collaboration agreement, which states that the research will be conducted in a common laboratory, and it is also expected that the research will be completed within a certain timeframe, similar to the way the Galapagos finch, Geospiza fortes, and the cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris, coexist.

[Tsonga]: Hambiswiritano, vanhu hinkwavo va le Belgium na le Switzerland lava vulavulaka Xifurwa, va nga va vadyondze Xifurwa xo olova exikolweni, kutani va nga ku tswisisa hambiloko u tirhisa ndlela ya ku hlaya tinomborho hi Xifurwa lexi oloveke.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Tsonga]: Eka malembe xidzana lama hundzeke, vanhu va tirhise vukheta ku endla mapatu eka tindhawu to kwaza, kuya eka switshunga swale lwandle.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Tsonga]: 800 wa timayili ta Trans-Alaska Pipeline System ti pfariwile endzhaku ka ku halaka ka magidi ya tibarele ta oyili edzongeni wa Fairbanks, le Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Tsonga]: Swiphemu swa Belgium ya namuntlha a ku ri xiphemu xa Luxembourg hi nkarhi lowu hundzeke kambe yi xiphemu xa Belgium endzhaku ka Nhlunga-vuhosi wa le Belgium was 1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Tsonga]: Ku sukela loko yi sunguriwile, The Onion yi hundzuke nhlangano lowukulu lowu encenyetaka mahungu, yi ni nkandziyiso lowu printiwaka, yi ni webusayiti leyi kokeke rinoko ra vanhu va 5,000,000 hi n’hweti ya October, leyi vanhu va navetisaka eka yona, yi ni xitichi xa mahungu lexi tlangaka tiawara ta 24, yi ni tipodcasts ni atlas ya misava leyi ya ha ku humesiwaka leyi vuriwaka Our Dumb World.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

src_text: Hambiswiritano, minkunguhato leyi a yi tekiwa tanihi leyi nga tirhiki hi xitshuketa, loko masocha lama tlulaka 800,000 ya Soviet’s Union Red Army ma nghena ni ku hlasela va yimisa emahlweni Belarus ni Ukraine endzhaku ka ku hlasela swifundzha swa le vuxeni swa Poland hi ku lwisana ni Riga Peace Treaty, Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, ni mintwanano yin’wana ya matiko, hi vumbirhi ya matlhelo mambirhi ni ya matlhelo yo tala.
ref_text: However, these plans were rendered obsolete nearly overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet's Union Red Army entered and created the Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.
hyp_text: Notwithstanding, the 800,000-strong Soviet's Union Red Army occupied Belarus and Ukraine after the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact and the Riga Peace Treaty, and the Soviet Union annexed eastern Poland, in accordance with the Molotov-Ribbentrop Pact, a secret protocol of the Molotov-Ribbentrop Pact, in the summer of 1939.

hyp_text: In order to avoid being misunderstood, it is necessary to use a method that will help you to understand each other's way of speaking.

[Tsonga]: Hambiswiritano, vanhu hinkwavo va le Belgium na le Switzerland lava vulavulaka Xifurwa, va nga va vadyondze Xifurwa xo olova exikolweni, kutani va nga ku tswisisa hambiloko u tirhisa ndlela ya ku hlaya tinomborho hi Xifurwa lexi oloveke.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Tsonga]: Eka malembe xidzana lama hundzeke, vanhu va tirhise vukheta ku endla mapatu eka tindhawu to kwaza, kuya eka switshunga swale lwandle.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Tsonga]: 800 wa timayili ta Trans-Alaska Pipeline System ti pfariwile endzhaku ka ku halaka ka magidi ya tibarele ta oyili edzongeni wa Fairbanks, le Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Tsonga]: Swiphemu swa Belgium ya namuntlha a ku ri xiphemu xa Luxembourg hi nkarhi lowu hundzeke kambe yi xiphemu xa Belgium endzhaku ka Nhlunga-vuhosi wa le Belgium was 1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Tsonga]: Ku sukela loko yi sunguriwile, The Onion yi hundzuke nhlangano lowukulu lowu encenyetaka mahungu, yi ni nkandziyiso lowu printiwaka, yi ni webusayiti leyi kokeke rinoko ra vanhu va 5,000,000 hi n’hweti ya October, leyi vanhu va navetisaka eka yona, yi ni xitichi xa mahungu lexi tlangaka tiawara ta 24, yi ni tipodcasts ni atlas ya misava leyi ya ha ku humesiwaka leyi vuriwaka Our Dumb World.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

src_text: Nkova wa Amazon i wa vumbirhi hi ku leha ni hi ku kula misava hinkwayo. Yi khoma hi laha ku phindhiweke ka 8 tanihi nkova wa vumbirhi.
ref_text: The Amazon River is the second longest and the biggest river on Earth. It carries more than 8 times as much water as the second biggest river.
hyp_text: Amazon's sales rank is in the top 8 in this category. It's been ranked this high since the beginning of the year.

[Tsonga]: Hambiswiritano, vanhu hinkwavo va le Belgium na le Switzerland lava vulavulaka Xifurwa, va nga va vadyondze Xifurwa xo olova exikolweni, kutani va nga ku tswisisa hambiloko u tirhisa ndlela ya ku hlaya tinomborho hi Xifurwa lexi oloveke.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Tsonga]: Eka malembe xidzana lama hundzeke, vanhu va tirhise vukheta ku endla mapatu eka tindhawu to kwaza, kuya eka switshunga swale lwandle.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Tsonga]: 800 wa timayili ta Trans-Alaska Pipeline System ti pfariwile endzhaku ka ku halaka ka magidi ya tibarele ta oyili edzongeni wa Fairbanks, le Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Tsonga]: Swiphemu swa Belgium ya namuntlha a ku ri xiphemu xa Luxembourg hi nkarhi lowu hundzeke kambe yi xiphemu xa Belgium endzhaku ka Nhlunga-vuhosi wa le Belgium was 1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Tsonga]: Ku sukela loko yi sunguriwile, The Onion yi hundzuke nhlangano lowukulu lowu encenyetaka mahungu, yi ni nkandziyiso lowu printiwaka, yi ni webusayiti leyi kokeke rinoko ra vanhu va 5,000,000 hi n’hweti ya October, leyi vanhu va navetisaka eka yona, yi ni xitichi xa mahungu lexi tlangaka tiawara ta 24, yi ni tipodcasts ni atlas ya misava leyi ya ha ku humesiwaka leyi vuriwaka Our Dumb World.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

[Tsonga]: 800 wa timayili ta Trans-Alaska Pipeline System ti pfariwile endzhaku ka ku halaka ka magidi ya tibarele ta oyili edzongeni wa Fairbanks, le Alaska.
